subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Alberto Contador of Spain won the Vuelta a España in Madrid, giving him a victory in each of cycling’s three major races. He won this year’s Giro d’Italia and the 2007 Tour de France.
snippet: Alberto Contador of Spain won the Vuelta a España in Madrid, giving him a victory in each of cycling’s three major races. He won this year’s Giro d’Italia and the 2007 Tour de France.
